casebody.data:
Kenneth Dorau v. Lawrence DelPonte, Commissioner of Motor Vehicles (11308)

La very, Heiman and Schaller, Js.

Argued February 8 decision released May 18, 1993 Gerald E. Farrell, for the appellant (plaintiff). Priscilla J. Green, assistant attorney general, with whom, on the brief, was Richard Blumenthal, attorney general, for the appellee (defendant). Heiman, J.

Our resolution of the same issue in Yanni v. DelPonte, 31 Conn. App. 350, 624 A.2d 1175 (1993), governs the disposition of this case.

The judgment is affirmed.

In this opinion Schaller, J., concurred.

 Lavery, J.,

concurring. I concur in the judgment. The due process concerns I expressed in my concurring opinion in Yanni v. DelPonte, 31 Conn. App. 350, 624 A.2d 1175 (1993), apply equally in this case.
